mapper.select: select distinct sm.menu_url "url" from tb_sys_user su ,tb_sys_user_role sur ,tb_sys_role sr ,tb_sys_permission sp ,tb_sys_role_permission srp ,tb_sys_menu sm ,tb_sys_permission_menu spm where su.id = sur.user_id and sr.id = sur.role_id and sr.id = srp.role_id and sp.id = srp.permission_id and sp.id = spm.permission_id and sm.id = spm.menu_id and su.status =1 and sur.status =1 and sr.status = 1 and sp.status = 1 and srp.status = 1 and sm.status = 1 and spm.status = 1 and su.id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} union all select distinct tsr.resources_url "url" from tb_sys_user su ,tb_sys_user_role sur ,tb_sys_role sr ,tb_sys_permission sp ,tb_sys_role_permission srp ,tb_sys_resources tsr ,tb_sys_permission_resources spr where su.id = sur.user_id and sr.id = sur.role_id and sr.id = srp.role_id and sp.id = srp.permission_id and sp.id = spr.permission_id and tsr.id = spr.resources_id and su.status =1 and sur.status =1 and sr.status = 1 and sp.status = 1 and srp.status = 1 and sr.status = 1 and spr.status = 1 and su.id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select distinct tsr.id "resourcesId" ,tsr.resources_url "resourcesUrl" ,tsr.menu_id "menuId" ,sm.menu_url "menuUrl" from tb_sys_user su ,tb_sys_user_role sur ,tb_sys_role sr ,tb_sys_permission sp ,tb_sys_role_permission srp ,tb_sys_resources tsr ,tb_sys_permission_resources spr ,tb_sys_menu sm where su.id = sur.user_id and sr.id = sur.role_id and sr.id = srp.role_id and sp.id = srp.permission_id and sp.id = spr.permission_id and tsr.id = spr.resources_id and sm.id = tsr.menu_id and su.status =1 and sur.status =1 and sr.status = 1 and sp.status = 1 and srp.status = 1 and sr.status = 1 and spr.status = 1 and sm.status = 1 and su.id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by sm.menu_url asc

select distinct r.id, r.resources_name as resourcesName, r.create_time as createTime, r.creator, r.resources_url as resourcesUrl, r.`status`, m.menu_name as menuId from tb_sys_resources r left join (SELECT * FROM tb_sys_menu WHERE STATUS = '1') m on r.menu_id = m.id where r.id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
SELECT id FROM tb_sys_resources WHERE menu_id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND `status` = '1' ORDER BY create_time DESC
